name: Golden Scarab
description:
MELT YOUR BRAIN

Golden Scarab is a psychedelic dual-stick shooter designed for short intense play sessions. Good for short wasabi blasts to the neurons.

WHAT SAY THE PEOPLE

"... a high intensity experience - I'm guessing most gamers won't play this for more than a few minutes at a time, else risk their brain shutting down in protest against the audio-visual onslaught." - Retro Gamer CD (rgcd.co.uk)

FEATURES

★ Five enemy types each with their own personality

★ Massive "arcadecore" dubstep soundtrack by BitBurner (CC-BY 3.0)

★ Local co-op tag team mode for two players

★ Ridiculous numbers of bullets and explosions

★ Non-time consuming play sessions

★ Supports most common gamepads

Like the music ? The track is "Manual Fire" by BitBurner (Twitter, Soundcloud), licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 License. You can get it here.

WARNING: This game contains flickering and flashing imagery that could trigger photosensitive epileptic seizures.
